sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const OnePet = props => { const [onePet, setOnePet] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/pets/${props._id}`) .then(res => setOnePet(res.data.pet)) }, []) return(

Pet Shelter

back to home

Details about: {onePet.name}

Pet Type: {onePet.type}

Description: {onePet.description}

Skills:

) } export default OnePet;
